hero.title: @asafarim/shared-i18n
hero.subtitle: Multi-language React package with cookie persistence & backend sync
hero.description: A production-ready i18n solution built on i18next, featuring automatic language detection, cookie-based persistence, and seamless backend integration.

multilang.title: Multi-language Support
multilang.description: Built-in support for English and Dutch with easy extensibility

persistence.title: Cookie Persistence
persistence.description: Language preferences persist across sessions and subdomains

backend.title: Backend Integration
backend.description: Automatic sync with user preferences API for authenticated users

hooks.title: React Hooks
hooks.description: Simple useLanguage hook for managing language state

detection.title: Auto Detection
detection.description: Automatically detects browser language on first visit

typescript.title: TypeScript First
typescript.description: Full TypeScript support with type-safe translations

demo.title: Interactive Demo
demo.hookDescription: The useLanguage hook provides language state and change functionality

tutorial.title: Step-by-Step Tutorial
tutorial.description: Follow these simple steps to install, configure, and use @asafarim/shared-i18n in your React app.

install.title: Install the package
install.description: Add the shared i18n package to your workspace using pnpm.
install.tip: Use --filter if you only want to install it for a specific workspace app.

initialize.title: Initialize i18n
initialize.description: Load your app-specific translations and call initI18n before rendering React.
initialize.tip: Keep initI18n in main.tsx so it runs once when the app boots.

translate.title: Translate UI
translate.description: Use the useTranslation hook to read keys from common or app namespaces.
translate.tip: Use the namespace prefix (e.g., app:key) when you need non-default namespaces.

languageHook.title: Handle language changes
languageHook.description: useLanguage exposes the active language, change handler, and loading state.
languageHook.tip: Disable buttons while isChanging is true to avoid duplicate requests.
